# Sangresuit
## Overview
**Type**: Magic Item
#Special-Item-Type/Magic-Item

**Group**: Wondrous Items
#Special-Item-Group/Wondrous-Items

**Rarity**: Very rare
#Special-Item-Rarity/Very-rare

**Attunement**: *(requires attunement)*

## Description
When active, this *[[Mycelosuits|mycelosuit]]* grants the wearer the benefits of the *nondetection* spell while activated. These suits are made from [[Sangre-Tigre|tiger blood]] caps ([[Sangre-Tigre|sangre-tigre]]).
